author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
The history will be cleaned a bit (fewer but preserving developer commits) after it passes tests.  (I hate rebasing before I know the final product.)

This version removes the dependence on new CondFormats from L1TGlobalProducer while waiting on:  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/14201.

This brings the updated uGT software with bitwise correct emulation of correlation conditions.   Until cms-sw/cmsdist#2254 the correlation conditions will be empty, but it should otherwise run fine.
title: Update to L1T Global for 2016 Menu (81X) - No Conditions Changes
